content:
```[EAC] Easy Anti Cheat errors and issues```
temporary

embeds.title: Untrusted system file error
embeds.description:
This error may appear when attempting to launch the game, and either:
**1.** You have a program or file interfering with/injecting into the game itself,
**2.** The listed file is out of date or corrupted

__Solutions:__
**1.** Make sure everything is up to date, such as Windows, Drivers, and the game itself
**2.** [Repair missing or corrupted Windows files](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/use-the-system-file-checker-tool-to-repair-missing-or-corrupted-system-files-79aa86cb-ca52-166a-92a3-966e85d4094e)
**3.** Double check that you don't have a program that is incompatible with Star Citizen:
```Known to Not Work with SC and EAC:
-Devreorder
-Localization tools not working
-Linux/Wine/DXVK/Sandboxie Plus do not work currently
-LED lighting (LEDKeeper2, ASRock RGB Utility Game Security Violation Detected (#000000D))
-EVGA Precision X1 may have issues
-VorpX
-windbg
-lasso
-overwolf
-epic launcher
-sonic studio
-Any software which creates overlays in the game.
-There may be more unverified or undetected software. Win11 works for some. Not at all for others.```

embeds.title: Error - Anticheat (CODE: 0)
embeds.description:
Due to __RSI Launcher update - Version 3.16.0 LIVE 7912978__
If you are getting the EAC code: 0 error, shown below:

Delete the `easyanticheat` folder in `C:\Program Files\Roberts Space Industries\StarCitizen\LIVE\` and then verify files in the launcher settings.

embeds.title: Easy Anti-Cheat Launch Error
embeds.description:
If you are getting the the Easy Anti Cheat error shown below, it may be one of the following reasons:
**1.** Star Citizen's EAC install is corrupted or unfinished
**2.** Your game's cache is corrupted (may happen after a 30k)

__**Solutions:**__
**1.** Download the following GameLauncher files, and put them into the folder: `\AppData\Roaming\EasyAntiCheat\GameLauncher`

**2.** Restart your PC
